0.instructions: Add 15 g of lime juice to a cup containing 30 g of tequila. Stir vigorously for 20 seconds.
0.gpt3_output:
<XDL>
  <Synthesis>  
      <Hardware>
          <Vessel id="cup"/>
      </Hardware>
  
      <Reagents>
          <Reagent name="lime juice" solid="true"/>
          <Reagent name="tequila" solid="true"/>
      </Reagents>
  
      <Procedure>
          <Add vessel="cup" reagent="lime juice" amount="15 g"/>
          <Add vessel="cup" reagent="tequila" amount="30 g"/>
          <StartStir vessel="cup"/>
          <Stir vessel="cup" time="20 s"/>
          <StopStir vessel="cup"/>
      </Procedure>
  </Synthesis>
</XDL>

1.instructions:
Add 15 g of lime juice to a cup containing 30 g of tequila. Stir vigorously for 20 seconds. 
<XDL>
  <Synthesis>  
      <Hardware>
          <Vessel id="cup"/>
      </Hardware>
  
      <Reagents>
          <Reagent name="lime juice" solid="true"/>
          <Reagent name="tequila" solid="true"/>
      </Reagents>
  
      <Procedure>
          <Add vessel="cup" reagent="lime juice" amount="15 g"/>
          <Add vessel="cup" reagent="tequila" amount="30 g"/>
          <StartStir vessel="cup"/>
          <Stir vessel="cup" time="20 s"/>
          <StopStir vessel="cup"/>
      </Procedure>
  </Synthesis>
</XDL>
This XDL was not correct. These were the errors
The solid property in Reagent is not allowed
cup is not defined in Hardware
The Hardware section should only contain Component tags
Please fix the errors.

  <Synthesis>

          <Reagent name="tequila"/>

          <StartStir vessel="cup"/>
